entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 09:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
